text: The Liberty City Seven were seven members of a small Miami, Florida-based religious group who called themselves the Universal Divine Saviors. They have been called a "bizarre cult". The seven were arrested and charged with terrorism-related offenses in 2006 after a Federal Bureau of Investigation sting investigation. They called themselves as representatives of Al-Qaeda and planned to destroy the Sears Tower in Chicago. The members of the group were located in the Miami neighborhood of Liberty City. ==References== Category:People from Miami Category:Cults
title: Liberty City Seven
